topics.body:
Lucky Star ep4 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]why is every anime OP so goddamn catchy

Konata cannot resist the allure of cookies

"it's not moe when she's clumsy" :P

*screech*

"Finals are coming up and here you are playing games all the time, you should be studying, you know?" umm... *pushes 3DS aside*

Konata's all-nighters really hit close to home with me XD

aaaaand suddenly everything took a turn :/

PRODUCTIVE PROCRASTINATION :D

*staaare*

"DON'T YOU EVER CUT ME OFF AGAIN"

*this'll do* I just love the quick statements that the characters make like that[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I don't think I'm gonna recognize a single one of these ED karaoke songs am I :P
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200
